metadata.description: Creates an emergency production pipeline using the kubernetes V2 standard
metadata.name: Kubernetes V2 Phoenix Service Emergency Production Template

variables.description: Prod Cluster Name (i.e. waivers-prod-api); leave '*' to use default pattern: {appName}-prod-api.
variables.name: prodClustername

variables.description: The Staging Load Balancer Name (i.e. waivers-staging-api); leave '*' to use default pattern: {appName}-staging-api.
variables.name: stagingLoadBalancerName

variables.description: The Prod Load Balancer Name (i.e. waivers-prod-api); leave '*' to use default pattern: {appName}-prod-api.
variables.name: prodLoadBalancerName

variables.description: Determines whether a separate set of pods should be created for batch jobs
variables.name: jobsEnabled

variables.description: The name of jobs cluster that contains the k8s pods generated by this pipeline; leave '*' to use default pattern: {appName}-jobs-api
variables.name: jobsClusterName

variables.description: The name of the jobs load balancer for clusters created by this pipeline; leave '*' to use default pattern: {appName}-prod-jobs
variables.name: jobsLoadBalancer

variables.description: The GCR account name that contains the image
variables.name: gcrAccountName

variables.description: The image name to pull; leave '*' to use default pattern: phoenix-service-{appName}
variables.name: gcrImageName

variables.description: The IAM role name for the service to use; leave '-' to not use
variables.name: iamRole

parameterValues.text: Starting Emergency Production Pipeline Deploy For ${ templateVariables.appName }
parameterValues.title: Starting Emergency Production Deploy To ${ templateVariables.appName }prod
